raw: * This class provides a JSON-RPC client object with auto-configuration of the
* transport used (based on the URI passed).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class provides a JSON-RPC client object with auto-configuration of the transport used (based on the URI passed).

raw: statics are not inherited from parent class
* Event fired before a request message is sent to the server.
* Event data is the {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Message} to
* be sent. This also allows listeners to configure the transport
* object beforehand.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event fired before a request message is sent to the server. Event data is the {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Message} to be sent. This also allows listeners to configure the transport object beforehand.

raw: * Event fired when a request results in an error. Event data is an instance of
* {@link qx.io.exception.Transport}, {@link qx.io.exception.Protocol},
* or {@link qx.io.exception.Cancel}.
* Event fired when a message is received from the endpoint. Event data
* is an UTF-8 encoded string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event fired when a request results in an error. Event data is an instance of {@link qx.io.exception.Transport}, {@link qx.io.exception.Protocol}, or {@link qx.io.exception.Cancel}. Event fired when a message is received from the endpoint. Event data is an UTF-8 encoded string

raw: * Event fired when a peer-originated JSON-RPC message has been
* received from the peer endpoint. Event data is an instance of {@link
* qx.io.jsonrpc.message.Batch}, {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.message.Request}
* or {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Notification}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event fired when a peer-originated JSON-RPC message has been received from the peer endpoint. Event data is an instance of {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.message.Batch}, {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.message.Request} or {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Notification}.

raw: * An optional string which is prepended to the method name by the {@link #sendRequest}
* and {@link #sendNotification} methods

@description.name: @description
@description.body: An optional string which is prepended to the method name by the {@link #sendRequest} and {@link #sendNotification} methods

raw: * The parser object, which must be a subclass of {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Parser}

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The parser object, which must be a subclass of {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Parser}

raw: * A cache of the requests which have been sent out and are still pending

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A cache of the requests which have been sent out and are still pending

raw: * If a service name has been configured, prepend it to the method name,
* unless it has already been prefixed
* @param {String} method
* @return {String}
* @private

@description.name: @description
@description.body: If a service name has been configured, prepend it to the method name, unless it has already been prefixed

raw: * Fires "error" event and throws the error after informing pending requests
* about the error.
* @param exception
* @private

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires "error" event and throws the error after informing pending requests about the error.

raw: * Send the given JSON-RPC message object using the configured transport
* @param {qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Message|qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Batch} message
* @return {qx.Promise} Promise that resolves (with no data)
* when the message has been successfully sent out, and rejects
* when there is an error or a cancellation up to that point.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Send the given JSON-RPC message object using the configured transport

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.Promise} Promise that resolves (with no data)
 when the message has been successfully sent out, and rejects
 when there is an error or a cancellation up to that point.
@return.description:
Promise that resolves (with no data)
 when the message has been successfully sent out, and rejects
 when there is an error or a cancellation up to that point.

raw: * Sends a single JSON-RPC request. If a method prefix name has been configured,
* it will be prepended to the method name.
* @param {String} method
* @param {Array|Object?} params
* @return {qx.Promise} Promise that resolves with the result to that request,
* and rejects with an exception in the {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.exception} namespace.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sends a single JSON-RPC request. If a method prefix name has been configured, it will be prepended to the method name.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.Promise} Promise that resolves with the result to that request,
 and rejects with an exception in the {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.exception} namespace.
@return.description:
Promise that resolves with the result to that request,
 and rejects with an exception in the {@link qx.io.jsonrpc.exception} namespace.

raw: * Sends a single JSON-RPC notification. Will use the method prefix
* @param {String} method
* @param {Array|Object?} params
* @return {qx.Promise} Promise that resolves immediately, (i.e. when the
* notification has been sent out (which is synchronous)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sends a single JSON-RPC notification. Will use the method prefix

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.Promise} Promise that resolves immediately, (i.e. when the
 notification has been sent out (which is synchronous)
@return.description:
Promise that resolves immediately, (i.e. when the
 notification has been sent out (which is synchronous)

raw: * Send the given message batch. Will use the method prefix.
* @param {qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Batch} batch
* @return {qx.Promise} Promise that resolves with an array of the responses
* to all requests in the batch, or rejects with any error that occurs.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Send the given message batch. Will use the method prefix.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.Promise} Promise that resolves with an array of the responses
 to all requests in the batch, or rejects with any error that occurs.
@return.description:
Promise that resolves with an array of the responses
 to all requests in the batch, or rejects with any error that occurs.

* @param {String} json JSON data

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Receives and handles an incoming JSON-RPC compliant message data

* @param {qx.io.jsonrpc.protocol.Message} message
* @private

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clean up after a message has been received

raw: * Handle an incoming message or batch of messages
